text: Hurricane Bret was the only hurricane to Texas in the 1990s. The storm hit a lightly populated region of Texas on August 22-23, 1999. It was a small hurricane. Bret struck south-central Texas with winds of . There were four indirect deaths from the storm in Texas. Bret killed no people directly. Damage from Bret was unusually low for a major hurricane. ==References== Category:Hurricanes in Texas Category:1999 Atlantic hurricane season Category:Category 4 Atlantic hurricanes Category:1999 in the United States Category:August 1999 events
title: Hurricane Bret
